callToAction.subTitle: A site for testing IT specialists, where you can test your skills and knowledge.

aboutUs.mainTitle: About the test, about the site, about us!
aboutUs.text1: Welcome to the site for testing IT specialists, where you can test your skills and knowledge.
aboutUs.text2: Upon completion, results statistics will be available.
aboutUs.text3: If you want to report a bug or change the questions for the test, go to
aboutUs.text4: and write to us about it.

benefitInfo.text1: Thanks to special questions, you will be able to take a fresh look at the material you have mastered
benefitInfo.text2: You will be able to evaluate your knowledge of each of them, and see which topic needs more attention
benefitInfo.text3: In the final report, you will be able to clearly see where your knowledge or skill gaps are and focus specifically on them

resultsInfo.subTitle: After passing the test, information about the test results will be available to you.

testRules.subTitle: Read the rules for taking the test, choose a direction, and then take the test.
testRules.rule1: You can only go back one question and change your answer.
testRules.rule2: There is only one correct answer for each question; you cannot select multiple options.
testRules.rule3: The test consists of several sections (blocks) with questions on various topics.
testRules.rule4: You can pause time by pressing the 'Pause' button and return to the test at any time.
